product_name: Saris Freedom SuperClamp 2 Hitch Rack - 2 Bike
long_description: Designed to fit a wide range of bicycles without touching the frames, the Saris Freedom SuperClamp 2 Hitch Rack uses an easy-to-reach low tray height to haul 2 bikes without fuss. Front and rear wheel hooks completely eliminate frame contact while providing a very secure hold and high stability. Low tray height makes it easy to put bikes onto rack, and 29 lb. weight makes putting the rack on your car manageable. Integrated cable lock and locking hitch pin keep bikes and rack secure. Upright holders on arms adjust quickly to fit a variety of bike types and sizes. Adjustable cradles and ratcheting anti-sway straps secure and stabilize bikes during transport. Folds down when not in use, giving easy access to door or hatch. The Saris Freedom SuperClamp 2 Hitch Rack fits 1.25 and 2 in. hitch receivers.
